Room.Name: Golden Dolphin Way
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Golden Dolphin Way, north of the City Walls.
Room.LongDescription: The intersection with Overland Drive lies to the east. Overland Drive is one of the long roads which runs directly past the Necropolis and the Manor of Natasha de Allisk. Golden Dolphin Way continues to the east and west, with the large, South City Walls running parallel to the road.
